law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 2, effective June 26, 2007; and ch. 139, sec. 4, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 480, sec. 6, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 102, effective December 1, 1998.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/26/2007). This section was amended by 2007 Ky. Acts chs. 76 and 139, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together. (6/26/2007). The amendment to this section in 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 2, effective June 26, 2007, is retroactive to July 1, 2004. See 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 5.
